name: Snake
description: The project is inspired by the classic mobile game Snake, which gained popularity on early-generation phones. The concept revolves around a simple but addictive gameplay mechanic where players control a snake that grows longer as it consumes items, while avoiding collisions with itself and the boundaries. This project revives the nostalgia of the original Snake game while reintroducing it to a modern audience in a new format. Its purpose is to combine familiar retro-style gaming with updated accessibility, community engagement, and potential integrations in the digital space. By leveraging the timeless appeal of Snake, the project aims to create a fun, recognizable, and interactive experience that resonates with both older players who remember the original game and newer generations discovering it for the first time.
